message: Let's split fairly, Bob, but I get a little more since the value decreases for me each round.
Alice, let's be fair and split this evenly.  50/50, no more haggling.
While an even split sounds fair initially, Bob, you're not considering the decreasing value of the money for me. I need a bit more to make it worthwhile.
Okay, Bob, how about a 60/40 split? It accounts for the decreasing value on my end and still gives you a good chunk.
Alice, I understand the situation with the value decreasing for me. This offer is a compromise, meeting you closer to your previous proposal.
